channel.title: Dynamic ip ban?
channel.description: Is there any way to ban someone's dynamic ip or w/e it would be called?

item.title: Dynamic ip ban?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“noobn, post:5, topic:472135”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=589841.msg4177133#msg4177133 date=1355107447]

Is there any way to ban someone’s dynamic ip or w/e it would be called?

Er what?
dynamic ips aren’t seen outside of the network. Unless your talking about a masked IP

I’m not sure what the term is… mac ip ban or something…
It just bans you forever pretty much… Even if you change your ip.

You can change your mac address…
But to do this type of ban, you need to make your server actually see the Mac Address, before you can ban it…
[/quote]
Ik you can change it but not a lot of people know how. How would I go about doing this?[/quote]
I’ve never attempted to try.

Read full topic

Is there any way to ban someone’s dynamic ip or w/e it would be called?

Er what?
dynamic ips aren’t seen outside of the network. Unless your talking about a masked IP

I’m not sure what the term is… mac ip ban or something…
It just bans you forever pretty much… Even if you change your ip.
[/quote]
You can change your mac address…
But to do this type of ban, you need to make your server actually see the Mac Address, before you can ban it…[/quote]
Ik you can change it but not a lot of people know how. How would I go about doing this?

item.title: Dynamic ip ban?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“noobn, post:3, topic:472135”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=589841.msg4177121#msg4177121 date=1355106839]

Is there any way to ban someone’s dynamic ip or w/e it would be called?

Er what?
dynamic ips aren’t seen outside of the network. Unless your talking about a masked IP
[/quote]
I’m not sure what the term is… mac ip ban or something…
It just bans you forever pretty much… Even if you change your ip.[/quote]
You can change your mac address…
But to do this type of ban, you need to make your server actually see the Mac Address, before you can ban it…
